channel.title: T.C. - Slices [Future Bass]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/toxiccaves64/slices
First track in a while! Took more of a future bass approach with this one, but still included the prominent melodic elements found in most of my songs.

item.title: T.C. - Slices [Future Bass]

item.description:
